title: Sinclair Lewis and F Scott Fitzgerald - pattern

content.question: Which of the following best characterizes the stance of the writers associated with the literary flowering of the 1920s, such as Sinclair Lewis and F. Scott Fitzgerald?

choices.label: Commitment to the cause of racial equality
Criticism of middle-class conformity and materialism

content.answer: Criticism of middle-class conformity and materialism

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
